mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.user_id AS "user.id", a.name AS "name", a.photo AS "photo", a.title AS "title", a.image AS "image", a.tags AS "tags", a.description AS "description", a.weight AS "weight", a.hits AS "hits", a.transmit AS "transmit", a.discess AS "discess", a.praise AS "praise", a.tread AS "tread", a.collection AS "collection", a.report AS "report", a.evaluate AS "evaluate", a.answer AS "answer", a.tip AS "tip", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.category AS "category", u2.name AS "user.name"
LEFT JOIN sys_user u2 ON u2.id = a.user_id
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM view_recommend a
AND a.name LIKE '%'||#{name}||'%' '%'+#{name}+'%' concat('%',#{name},'%')
AND a.title LIKE '%'||#{title}||'%' '%'+#{title}+'%' concat('%',#{title},'%')
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO view_recommend( id, user_id, name, photo, title, image, tags, description, weight, hits, transmit, discess, praise, tread, collection, report, evaluate, answer, tip, create_date, category ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{user.id}, #{name}, #{photo}, #{title}, #{image}, #{tags}, #{description}, #{weight}, #{hits}, #{transmit}, #{discess}, #{praise}, #{tread}, #{collection}, #{report}, #{evaluate}, #{answer}, #{tip}, #{createDate}, #{category} )
mapper.update: UPDATE view_recommend SET user_id = #{user.id}, name = #{name}, photo = #{photo}, title = #{title}, image = #{image}, tags = #{tags}, description = #{description}, weight = #{weight}, hits = #{hits}, transmit = #{transmit}, discess = #{discess}, praise = #{praise}, tread = #{tread}, collection = #{collection}, report = #{report}, evaluate = #{evaluate}, answer = #{answer}, tip = #{tip}, category = #{category} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM view_recommend a
and FIND_IN_SET(#{tags},a.tags)
ORDER by weight desc,create_date desc
